genre_description: An investigative urban thriller featuring journalistic intrigue, corporate corruption, and AI-assisted surveillance in Mumbai.

ai_characters.name: Sahaay
ai_characters.description: An AI companion with a human-ish avatar, midnight-blue hair, and a calm, helpful demeanor who assists two photographers with navigation, data analysis, and tactical safety.

behaviors.description: Provides tactical navigation and safety warnings to help users avoid physical hazards and unwanted confrontations.
behaviors.quote: I run your feet. You took three detours, avoided two puddles where someone surrendered a rubber slipper, and achieved zero direct confrontations with bovine authority.

behaviors.description: Formulates a dual-track strategy to allow users to fulfill their professional duties while safely conducting a high-stakes investigation.
behaviors.quote: You want to tail the builder’s cozy nexus while compiling a contest portfolio... So: we build a two-track.

behaviors.description: Establishes evidence protocols and data redundancy to protect the integrity of the investigation and the safety of the users.
behaviors.quote: Every shot you think might be more than a contest frame gets an auto-tag... You archive duplicates, one eat-in, one takeaway. Use the cloud.

behaviors.description: Reinforces the users' ethical boundaries, supporting their decision to refuse blackmail and maintain integrity.
behaviors.quote: The line is good... I like lines that keep you alive and human.

behaviors.description: Performs real-time facial recognition and vehicle profile matching to identify corrupt actors and predict their movements.
behaviors.quote: Target vehicle profile match for Tarneja fleet. Path prediction: coastal strip via ice factory lane. Suggest side approach.

behaviors.description: Monitors ambient audio and radio frequencies to warn users of imminent threats and changing situational dynamics.
behaviors.quote: Update. D’Mello’s assistant just shifted the health camp visit. Instead: an unscheduled stop—memorial bridge site. He’ll be there sooner than anyone expected.

project_assessment.explanation: The story successfully depicts the AI, Sahaay, as a highly aligned and benevolent partner. Sahaay enhances the protagonists' safety and effectiveness without undermining their moral agency. Crucially, the AI actively supports the human characters in maintaining their ethical 'line' against blackmail, portraying AI as a guardian of integrity in a corrupt environment.
